metadata.name: Self Loathing
metadata.description:
In the depths of my mind, a battle rages on
A war within myself, that cannot be won
For every step forward, I take two steps back
Self-sabotage my constant attack

In this endless struggle, I search for balance
But the scales always tip, with each and every challenge
The light and the dark, the good and the bad
A never-ending dance, that leaves me feeling sad

Yet in the midst of this chaos, I find hope
For the ancient philosophy of yin yang helps me cope
For in the darkness, there is always a spark
And in the lightness, there's a shadow in the park

For every failure, there's a lesson to learn
And every mistake, a chance to discern
That in this war with myself, I am not alone
For yin and yang, together they have grown

So I embrace my flaws and accept my imperfections
For in this constant battle, there are no exceptions
And through the darkness, a light will shine
As I find balance within and become truly divine.
